translations.translation: They are given the choicest sealed wine to drink,
They will be served the choicest wine, sealed
They will be served a drink of the finest sealed wine,
They will be given pure wine out of sealed containers
They will be given pure wine to drink, which is kept preserved, sealed.
They will be given to drink of pure sealed Rahiq.
They are made to quaff of a pure drink that is sealed (to others).
as they are given to drink of a wine sealed
They are given to drink of a pure wine, sealed,
They will be given a drink of pure wine, sealed,
They will be given to drink of pure wine, sealed.
They will be served with a sealed pure wine,
Their thirst will be slaked with Pure Wine sealed:
They will be given to drink pure sealed wine.
They shall be given to drink of a wine that is sealed,
They will be given to drink a sealed wine.
They will be given to drink [pure] wine [which was] sealed.
[83:25] as they are given to drink a nectar, a wine free of any impurities, [that is] sealed, in its vessel, none other than them breaking its seal,
They are given to drink) in Paradise (of a pure wine, sealed) mixed,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { يُسْقَوْنَ مِن رَّحِيقٍ مَّخْتُومٍ خِتَامُهُ مِسْكٌ } معناه مَمزوجٌ، وخِتامُهُ: خَلطُهُ
 ويقال: طَعمُهُ ورِيحُهُ




وقوله تعالى: { وَفِي ذَلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلْمُتَنَافِسُونَ } معناه يَرغبُ فيهِ الرَّاغبونَ

translations.translation:
And His saying, {They will be given to drink of a sealed spring, the seal of which is musk} means that it is mixed, and its seal is musk.


It is said that its taste and smell are both excellent.

And His saying - the Most High - {And in that let the competitors compete} means the desiring desire it.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
مع ذلك { يُسْقَوْنَ مِن رَّحِيقٍ } خمر من خمور المحبة والولاء { مَّخْتُومٍ } [المطففين: 25] مطبوع على غيرهم
 بحيث لا يشمون روائحها أصلاً
